product_name: Lonely Planet Guides Yosemite, Sequoia and Kings Canyon National Parks - 3rd Edition
long_description: The updated edition of Lonely Planet Guides. Authors: Beth Kohn and Sara Benson. Softcover; 254 pages; black-and-white photographs with a short color section. Lonely Planet Publications Pty Ltd; copyright 2012. Lonely Planet Guides. Includes 54 of the most enjoyable hikes through valleys, around lakes, up peaks and into the backcountry. Includes easy-to-use charts and topographic hiking maps. Kids and pets chapter has information on education programs, campfire talks, ranger walks, and the best kid-friendly hikes. Covers rock climbing, mountain biking, swimming, horseback riding, rafting, kayaking, skiing, sledding, volunteering and much more.
short_description: The updated edition of Lonely Planet Guides Yosemite, Sequoia and Kings Canyon National Parks includes detailed information on hiking, family-friendly adventures and ideas for itineraries.
